thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shutterstock Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shutterstock Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.06
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Shutterstock Inc:
* SHUTTERSTOCK REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 16.6 PERCENT TO $151.8 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34, REVENUE VIEW $143.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 REVENUE $625 MILLION - $635 MILLION, EXCLUDING CONTRIBUTION OF WEBDAM
* SHUTTERSTOCK SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $105 - $110 MILLION, EXCLUDING CONTRIBUTION OF WEBDAM
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $609.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
